publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-49 Maureen Macmillan: Domestic violence—That the Parliament considers with the utmost urgency the Work Plan drawn up by the Scottish Partnership on Domestic Violence. This work plan is at the moment out for consultation, the deadline for responses being 30 June and should then be laid before Parliament. (lodged on 9 June)

S1M-49 Maureen Macmillan: That the Parliament considers with the utmost urgency the Work Plan drawn up by the Scottish Partnership on Domestic Violence. This work plan is at the moment out for consultation, the deadline for responses being 30 June, after which it should be laid before Parliament. (lodged 9 June 1999)

S1M-49 Maureen Macmillan: That the Parliament considers with the utmost urgency the Work Plan drawn up by the Scottish Partnership on Domestic Violence. This work plan is at the moment out for consultation, the deadline for responses being 30 June and should then be laid before Parliament. (lodged on 9 June 1999)

S1M-49 Maureen Macmillan: Domestic violence—That the Parliament considers with the utmost urgency the Work Plan drawn up by the Scottish Partnership on Domestic Violence. This work plan is at the moment out for consultation, the deadline for responses being 30 June and should then be laid before Parliament. (lodged on 9 June 1999)

*S1M-49 Maureen Macmillan: That the Parliament note that the work plan drawn up by the Scottish Partnership on Domestic Violence is currently out for consultation with a deadline for responses of 30 June 1999, and call upon Scottish Ministers to lay the work plan before the Parliament for consideration as soon as possible after 1 July 1999.
